definition: being ten more than forty, the 12th letter of the Roman alphabet
details:
adjective
- being ten more than forty
= synonyms: fifty
noun
- the 12th letter of the Roman alphabet
- a metric unit of capacity, formerly defined as the volume of one kilogram of pure water under standard conditions
= example: a metric unit of capacity, formerly defined as the volume of one kilogram of pure water under standard conditions
= synonyms: liter, litre, cubic decimeter, cubic decimetre
